com.github.ldeitos.validation

Interface Validator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    jakarta.validation.Validator

    public interface Validator
extends jakarta.validation.Validator
    Interface to ExtendedValidator implementation.
    Author:
    Leandro Deitos

    • Method Detail

      • validateBean

        <T> Set<Message> validateBean(T object,
                            Class<?>... groups)
        Parameters:
        object - Object to validate
        groups - The group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        Returns:
        Violations messages or empty if none.

      • validatePropertyBean

        <T> Set<Message> validatePropertyBean(T object,
                                    String propertyName,
                                    Class<?>... groups)
        Parameters:
        object - Object to validate
        propertyName - Property to validate (i.e. field and getter constraints)
        groups - The group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        Returns:
        Violations messages or empty if none.

      • validateValueBean

        <T> Set<Message> validateValueBean(Class<T> beanType,
                                 String propertyName,
                                 Object value,
                                 Class<?>... groups)
        Parameters:
        beanType - The bean type
        propertyName - Property to validate
        value - Property value to validate
        groups - The group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default).
        Returns:
        Violations messages or empty if none.

      • validateAndThrow

        <T> void validateAndThrow(T object,
                        Class<?>... groups)
                      throws ViolationException
        Parameters:
        object - Object to validate
        groups - The group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        Throws:
        ViolationException - Occurs when object under validation has violations.
        Since:
        0.9.2
